snippet: Facing political furor, President Obama corrects earlier statements and offers a way to let some people keep their current insurance policies.
abstract: Editorial questions Pres Obama's proposal for modest fix to the health care reform law that allows people to keep their health insurance plans; notes, while it is far preferable to other proposals, it is unclear how a temporary fix will affect the overall goal of upgrading benefits covered and keeping premiums affordable; holds reversal was only necessary due to the administration's incompetence in rollout of health care reforms.
lead_paragraph: Facing political furor, President Obama corrects earlier statements and offers a way to let some people keep their current insurance policies.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
